content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price. I am aiming for the highest possible price. What is your first offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student and I am smart. I can offer 500 Euro per month. This is a good price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but I am looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate. What is your next offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can offer 550 Euro per month. This is still a good price for the apartment. It is newly built, unfurnished, has 50 square meters, one bedroom, and is in the city center. It is also close to all important facilities.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Your offer is getting closer to my expectations, but I am still looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate. What is your next offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can offer 600 Euro per month. This is a fair price for the apartment. It is newly built, unfurnished, has 50 square meters, one bedroom, and is in the city center. It is also close to all important facilities.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Your offer is getting closer to my expectations, but I am still looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate. What is your next offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can offer 650 Euro per month. This is a reasonable price for the apartment. It is newly built, unfurnished, has 50 square meters, one bedroom, and is in the city center. It is also close to all important facilities.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Your offer is getting closer to my expectations, but I am still looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate. What is your next offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can offer 700 Euro per month. This is a good price for the apartment. It is newly built, unfurnished, has 50 square meters, one bedroom, and is in the city center. It is also close to all important facilities.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Your offer is getting closer to my expectations. I accept your offer of 700 Euro per month. I agree to the price of 700 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
